content: the #minicastawaysocks are worked toe-up in the round using basic knitting techniques the toe is made using judy s magic cast-on method the heel is shaped using a forethought heel and the cuff has a 1 1 ribbing needles 3mm double pointed knitting needles or 3mm circular needles magic loop gauge 25 stitches x 32 row = 10x10 cm yarn polo by mondial 50 g/200 m size 3-6 month old baby
